title: Packaging a Python desktop application using PyInstaller
description:
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = Glenn
Ramsey: Packaging a Python desktop application using PyInstaller = = = =
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = @ Kiwi PyCon
2014 - Saturday, 13 Sep 2014 - Track 2 http://kiwi.pycon.org/

**Audience level**

Intermediate

**Description**

What PyInstaller does. How it works. How to use it. What to do when it
doesn't work.

**Abstract**

This talk will be an introduction to using PyInstaller for packaging a
desktop application on Windows and OSX. It will briefly outline how
PyInstaller works and describe how to use it, with some simple examples.
Finally some techniques to use for debugging a built package will be
discussed.

**Slides**

https://speakerdeck.com/nzpug/glenn-ramsey-packaging-a-python-desktop-application-using-pyinstaller
